view

Class GameCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameCharacter

  • public class GameCharacter
extends java.lang.Object

    GameCharacter

    Represent the character in maze. Draw the character on each move or screen resize.

    Author:
    Valentina Munoz & Moris Amon

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameCharacter

        public GameCharacter(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display display,
                     java.lang.String imgPath,
                     java.lang.String flipImgPath)

        GameCharacter

        Initialize data and images.

        Parameters:
        display - display to add the character
        imgPath - image path of character (left)
        flipImgPath - image path of character (right)

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        public void paint(org.eclipse.swt.events.PaintEvent e,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int w,
                  int h)

        paint

        On each move or screen resize, paint is called. It check if the character is moving right or left and draw the correct image.

        Parameters:
        e - paintEvent of maze widget
        x - x position in screen
        y - y position in screen
        w - character width
        h - character height
